Title: The Puppetmaster
Writer: T'ien-wen Chu, Tianlu Li (story), Nien-Jen Wu
Actors: Tianlu Li, Giong Lim, Ming Hwa Bai, Fue Choung Cheng
Plot: In the first half of this century, young Li Tienlu joines a travelling puppet theatre and subsequently makes a career as one of Taiwan's leading puppeteers. During World War II the Japanese...
